author: Vanity Fair
title: David Beckham, Denzel Washington, and More Celebrities with Doppelgänger Sons Photos | Vanity Fair
text: Vanity Fair Genetics! It’s fun to see them at work, especially when it means linking a celebrity offspring with his famous parent. Often it’s female stars and their daughters who get all the lookalike attention , but in the case of these men, the apple clearly didn’t fall far from the tree. Read More
